name: finsync-monorepo
description: Unified repository for FinSync AI projects

scripts.install-all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend:landing && npm run install:frontend:dashboard && npm run install:frontend:ar && npm run install:frontend:agents && npm run install:frontend:agents:backend
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend:landing" "npm run start:frontend:dashboard" "npm run start:frontend:ar" "npm run start:frontend:agents:backend" "npm run start:frontend:agents"
scripts.lint-all: npm run lint:frontend:landing && npm run lint:frontend:ar
scripts.build-all: npm run build:frontend:landing && npm run build:frontend:dashboard && npm run build:frontend:ar
